metadata.feature_description: Create multiple pages at once with validation and batch processing

steps.expected: Dialog should open with bulk page settings
steps.actual: Dialog opened successfully with Branch Parent, Keywords, Tags, Workflow, Display in Menu, Link Tracking, and Enable Scheduling options

steps.action: Entered three page names: BulkTest Page Alpha, BulkTest Page Beta, BulkTest Page Gamma
steps.expected: Page names should be accepted and buttons should become enabled
steps.actual: Page names accepted, Validate Page(s) and Add Page(s) buttons became enabled

steps.expected: System should validate the pages and show success message
steps.actual: Success message displayed: '3 pages were validated.'

steps.action: Changed workflow to Direct Publish and clicked Add Page(s)
steps.actual: Pages were created successfully and appeared in the page list (BulkTest Page Alpha, BulkTest Page Beta, BulkTest Page Gamma visible in page tree)

issues: Initial attempt with Content Approval workflow returned 500 server error; Direct Publish workflow succeeded

steps.action: Attempted to create pages with names that already exist (BulkTest Page Alpha, Beta, Gamma)
steps.expected: System should reject duplicate page names with appropriate error message
steps.actual: System displayed error: '0 of 3 pages were created. BulkTest Page Alpha: The Page Name you chose is already being used for another page at the same level of the page hierarchy.' (same for Beta and Gamma)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test validation errors with empty inputs

steps.action: Opened Add Multiple Pages dialog with empty bulk pages text area
steps.expected: Action buttons should be disabled when no input is provided
steps.actual: Validate Page(s) and Add Page(s) buttons were correctly disabled when the text area was empty

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test parent page assignment with hierarchy

steps.expected: Pages should be created with proper parent-child hierarchy
steps.actual: Page input was accepted and displayed correctly

steps.action: Set workflow to Direct Publish and clicked Add Page(s)
steps.expected: Parent and child pages should be created with proper hierarchy
steps.actual: Server returned 500 Internal Server Error. Page creation failed.

issues: Server returns 500 Internal Server Error when attempting to create pages with hierarchy (using '>' prefix for child pages)
This appears to be a backend bug in the bulk page creation with hierarchy feature

observations: The bulk page creation feature has UI for specifying page hierarchy using '>' prefix, but the backend appears to have issues processing hierarchical page creation
Content Approval workflow causes 500 errors during bulk page creation; Direct Publish workflow works for flat page structures
The validation feature (PreSaveBulkPagesValidate API) works correctly
Duplicate page name detection works correctly with clear error messages
Empty input validation is handled at the UI level by disabling action buttons
